alert.note: Alert for Woodbury (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 04 at 5:25PM CDT until July 04 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL WOODBURY...DAKOTA AND CENTRAL DIXON COUNTIES... At 523 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Allen, or 8 miles south of Ponca, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 509 PM, a trained weather spotter reported up to two inch in diameter branches down in Martinsburg! IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sioux City, South Sioux City, Sergeant Bluff, Dakota City, Homer, Allen, Hubbard, Jackson In Dakota County, Martinsburg, Waterbury and Winnebago Reservation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
